name: Pocky & Rocky with Becky (2001)
description: Pocky & Rocky with Becky, known in Japan as Kiki Kaikai Advance (奇々怪界あどばんす), is a shoot 'em up video game developed by Altron for the Game Boy Advance (GBA). Distributed by Taito Corporation, the game was published by Altron in Japan, and localized by Natsume in North America. It is the third game published under the Pocky & Rocky title.
